metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Developer Week May 15-19, our week-long series of new product announcements and events dedicated to enhancing the developer experience to fuel productivity! View Updates and Announcements here

relatedBlades.title: Welcome to Developer Week 2023 | May 15-19
relatedBlades.subtitle: Cloudflare Developer Week May 15-19, our week-long series of new product announcements and events dedicated to enhancing the developer experience to fuel productivity!

features.title: Welcome to Developer Week 2023
features.description: It is an incredibly exciting time to be a developer. We couldn't imagine a better time to be kicking off Developer Week here at Cloudflare.

features.title: Batteries included: how AI will transform the who and how of programming
features.description: The recent arrival of LLMs capable of assisting programmers in writing, debugging and modifying code is yet another step. It's a step at both making programmers more productive and helping more people be programmers.

imageAssetFile.altText: The future of software development is AI
imageAssetFile.title: The future of software development is AI

features.title: Introducing Constellation, bringing AI to the Cloudflare stack
features.description: Today, we're excited to welcome Constellation to the Cloudflare stack. Constellation allows you to run fast, low-latency inference tasks on pre-trained machine learning models natively on Workers.

features.title: Zero Trust Security for AI
features.description: Secure your team's usage of AI tools with Cloudflare One.

features.title: Query Cloudflare Radar and our docs using ChatGPT plugins
features.description: We're excited to share two new Cloudflare ChatGPT plugins – the Cloudflare Radar plugin and the Cloudflare Docs plugin.

features.title: Introducing Cursor: the Cloudflare AI Assistant
features.description: Check out Cursor - our experimental AI assistant trained to answer questions about Cloudflare's Developer Platform!

features.title: A raft of free Cloudflare services for AI startups
features.description: Bootstrapped AI startups can get the startup plan without accelerator affiliation.

features.title: Announcing database integrations: a few clicks to connect to Neon, PlanetScale and Supabase on Workers
features.description: Today we're announcing Database Integrations – making it seamless to connect to your database of choice on Workers. To start, we've added some of the most popular databases that support HTTP connections: Neon, PlanetScale and Supabase with more to come!

features.title: Announcing connect() — a new API for creating TCP sockets from Cloudflare Workers
features.description: Today, we are excited to announce a new API in Cloudflare Workers for creating outbound TCP sockets, making it possible to connect directly to databases and any TCP-based service from Workers.

imageAssetFile.title: Talk to any Service over TCP

contentfulAsset.description: API code for creating TCP sockets

features.title: Smart Placement speeds up applications by moving code close to your backend — no config needed
features.description: Smart Placement automatically places your workloads in an optimal location that minimizes latency and speeds up your applications!

features.title: The S3 to R2 Super Slurper is now Generally Available
features.description: Use Super Slurper to quickly, securely, and easily migrate data from S3 to R2.

imageAssetFile.title: Migrate to R2 from S3 with Super Slurper

features.title: Use Snowflake with R2 to extend your global data lake
features.description: Joint customers can now use Snowflake with Cloudflare R2 to extend your global data lake without having to worry about egress fee

features.title: Cloudflare R2 and MosaicML enable training LLMs on any compute, anywhere in the world, with zero switching costs
features.description: Together, Cloudflare and MosaicML give customers the freedom to train LLMs on any compute, anywhere in the world, with zero switching costs. That means faster, cheaper training runs, and no vendor lock in.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of shapes inside a cloud

features.title: Goodbye, section 2.8 and hello to Cloudflare's new terms of service
features.description: We're excited to announce new updates that will modernize our terms of service and hopefully cut down on customer confusion and frustration.

features.title: Bringing a unified developer experience to Cloudflare Workers and Pages
features.description: Today we're excited to announce that over the next year we will be working to bring together the best traits and attributes you know and love from each product into one powerful platform!

imageAssetFile.altText: Pages and Workers are merging into a unified development and application hosting platform
imageAssetFile.title: Pages and Workers are merging into a unified development and application hosting platform

features.title: Making Cloudflare the best place for your web applications
features.description: Angular, Astro, Next, Nuxt, Qwik, Remix, Solid, Svelte, Vue on Cloudflare? Deployed globally, even "beyond the edge", with a single command? And all for $0 or a fraction of the usual cost? Try: npm create cloudflare And check out: blog.cloudflare.com

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare is the best place to host and run your Web applications
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare is the best place to host and run your Web applications

features.title: Modernizing the toolbox for Cloudflare Pages builds
features.description: A new beta build system is now available for Cloudflare Pages. We've updated our default languages and tools, and made some exciting underlying architecture changes. Enable it in your project settings in the dashboard today! ⚡

imageAssetFile.altText: New Pages build image with support for new languages and versions
imageAssetFile.title: New Pages build image with support for new languages and versions

features.title: A whole new Quick Edit in Cloudflare Workers
features.description: We're proud to announce an improved dashboard editor experience that allows users to edit multi-module Workers, use real edge previews, and debug their Workers more easily - all powered by Workers and VSCode for the Web.

features.title: Improved local development with wrangler and workerd, Developer Week
features.description: We're proud to announce the release of Wrangler v3 – the first version of Wrangler with local-by-default development, powered by Miniflare v3 and the open-source Workers `workerd` runtime.

imageAssetFile.title: Improved local development with wrangler and workerd

features.title: Announcing Cloudflare Secrets Store
features.description: Introducing Secrets Store by Cloudflare - the ultimate solution for managing your application secrets securely. Safeguard sensitive information, track access, and maintain ease of use.

features.title: How to secure Generative AI applications
features.description: Earn best practices for securing generative AI applications based on Cloudflare's experience protecting some of the largest AI applications in the world.

imageAssetFile.altText: How to secure consumer facing Large Language Model APIs
imageAssetFile.title: How to secure consumer facing Large Language Model APIs

features.title: Using LangChainJS and Cloudflare Workers together
features.description: We are incredibly stoked that our friends at LangChain have announced LangChainJS Support for Cloudflare Workers! In this post we'll show you how to build a sample application.

features.title: How Cloudflare is powering the next generation of platforms with Workers
features.description: Workers for Platforms is our Workers offering for customers building new platforms on Cloudflare Workers. Let's take a look back and recap why we built Workers for Platforms, show you some of the most interesting problems our customers have been solving and share new features that are now available!

imageAssetFile.altText: Powering next generation of platforms on Workers – Vercel and Shopify
imageAssetFile.title: Powering next generation of platforms on Workers – Vercel and Shopify

features.title: Building Cloudflare on Cloudflare
features.description: Cloudflare was originally built as native services, but we're building more and more of it on Cloudflare itself. This post describes how and why we're doing this.

imageAssetFile.altText: Project Flame - rebuilding the Cloudflare CDN on workers
imageAssetFile.title: Project Flame - rebuilding the Cloudflare CDN on workers

features.title: D1: We turned it up to 11
features.description: We've been heads down iterating on D1, and we've just shipped a major new version that's substantially faster, more reliable, and introduces Time Travel: the ability to restore a D1 database to any point in time.

features.title: More Node.js APIs in Cloudflare Workers — stream, path, string decoder
features.description: Today we are announcing support for three additional APIs from Node.js in Cloudflare Workers — stream, crypto, and http/https.request. This increases compatibility with the existing ecosystem of open source NPM packages, allowing you to use your preferred libraries in Workers.

imageAssetFile.altText: More Node.js APIs - streams, crypto, and http.request
imageAssetFile.title: More Node.js APIs - streams, crypto, and http.request

features.title: Cloudflare Queues: messages at your speed with consumer concurrency and explicit acknowledgement
features.description: Queues is faster than ever before! Now queues will automatically scale up your consumers, clearing out backlogs in a flash. Explicit Acknowledgement allows developers to acknowledge or retry individual messages in a batch, preventing work from being repeated.

features.title: Developer Week Performance Update: Spotlight on R2
features.description: For Developer Week 2023, we're going to be looking at one of the newest Cloudflare developer offerings and how it compares to an alternative when retrieving assets from buckets: R2 versus Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3).

imageAssetFile.altText: R2 is faster than S3 and GCP (Performance update)
imageAssetFile.title: R2 is faster than S3 and GCP (Performance update)

features.title: Workers Browser Rendering API enters open beta
features.description: The Workers Browser Rendering API allows developers to programmatically control and interact with a headless browser instance and create automation flows for their applications and products. Today we enter the open beta and start onboarding our customers.

features.title: Recapping Developer Week
features.description: Developer Week 2023 is officially a wrap. Let's take a look at everything we shipped last week.

features.title: Announcing Cohort #2 of the Workers Launchpad
features.description: Announcing the second cohort of the Workers Launchpad - we can't wait to work with them and showcase these incredible companies building on Cloudflare's Developer Platform!

features.title: Launching our new Open Source Software Sponsorships Program
features.description: Our Open Source Sponsorship Program is back to take your projects to the next level! Join us as we support impactful projects, and celebrate the power of collaboration.
